translation.en: [Lin-Manuel Miranda] Growing up with Walter Mercado,
translation.ko: 전 왈테르 메르카도를 보며 자란 세대죠, 제 기억에...

translation.en: I just remember thinking how dramatic he was.
translation.ko: 전 왈테르 메르카도를 보며 자란 세대죠, 제 기억에... 그는 참 인상적인 사람이었어요

translation.en: And how fabulous he was.
I can't think of an English language astrologer
that would command the attention of millions of households.
translation.ko: 왈테르만큼 수많은 가정을 사로잡은 사람은 없어요

translation.en: [Lin-Manuel] It was just Walter.
[in Spanish] The first time I saw Walter Mercado on television, it was a shock.
translation.ko: TV에서 왈테르 메르카도를 처음 보고 뜨악했어요

translation.en: I was like, "What is this that I'm watching?"
If you can give love, if you can receive love? So what?
[Eugenio Derbez in English] It's a woman? It's a man?
It's a sorcerer?
[Lin-Manuel] It was just a staple of our childhood.
If you went to visit anyone, Walter Mercado was on.
translation.ko: 어느 집에 가든 왈테르 메르카도를 보고 있었고

translation.en: And you would be quiet until you got to hear your sign.
translation.ko: 자기 별자리가 나올 때까지 조용히 기다렸죠

translation.en: [Raul de Molina] Walter was unique. He was different, he was a pioneer.
...the gifted, the talented Walter Mercado!
-Do you know who Walter Mercado is? -Of course!
Some people who speak English
do not understand how loved you are in the Spanish community.
translation.ko: 당신이 스페인어권에서 얼마나 큰 스타였는지 몰라요

translation.en: You're bigger than Jesus Christ.
He made me believe through the force of his oratory.
translation.ko: 왈테르의 현란한 말솜씨에 다들 그 말을 믿었죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Manifest exactly what you want.
Visualize exactly your dreams.
It will be yours.
[Lin-Manuel in English] I just think he's this positive force.
He's literally sending positive vibes through the television at you
translation.ko: 텔레비전을 통해 긍정적인 기운을 전해 줘요

translation.en: one astrological sign at a time.
[Walter in Spanish] Follow your heart. Your heart is never wrong.
translation.ko: 마음의 소리를 따르세요 마음은 틀리는 법이 없죠

translation.en: [in English] And then signing off con "Mucho, mucho amor."
[Eugenio] But all of a sudden, he disappeared.
Many people were calling in and asking. They were asking me,
translation.ko: 문의 전화가 빗발쳤고 왈테르 메르카도의 소식을 물었어요

translation.en: "Hey, what happened to Walter Mercado?"
I don't know.
I've lost contact with Walter.
I thought he was living in Mexico.
[in Spanish] I have a theory that he didn't want to grow old in front of the cameras.
translation.ko: 늙어 가는 모습을 공개하길 꺼렸던 게 아닐까 싶어요

translation.en: He's sick and he retired.
He lives in a mansion in Puerto Rico that's like a huge fortress
translation.ko: 푸에르토리코의 거대한 요새 같은 저택에 사는데

translation.en: where no one can enter.
[in English] He died two times.
Two times.
I heard that he lives in The Grove.
Maybe he's an extraterrestrial.
Probably has his own planet somewhere.
[in Spanish] People say a lot of things and invent even more.
translation.ko: 저마다 추측을 내놓고 별말을 다 지어내요

translation.en: [Eugenio in English] Where is Walter Mercado? What happened to him?
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도는 어디 있죠? 어떻게 됐을까요?

translation.en: We miss him. We really miss him.
[Walter in Spanish] These are old things, very old.
[woman on TV in English] The highly successful spiritual master
has established himself as a leading authority in astrology and mysticism.
translation.ko: 점성술과 신비주의의 대표적인 권위자로 자리 잡았습니다

translation.en: [in Spanish] Look, Willie!
[woman in English] Walter Mercado guest-starred on many popular TV shows.
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도는 다수의 인기 TV 프로에도 출연했죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Look.
It's very emotional for me.
[Walter] I think that the worst things sometimes are necessary to grow up.
translation.ko: 최악의 시련은 성장의 필수 관문이 되기도 해요

translation.en: I've had very, very, very difficult problems.
I suffered a lot.
I lost a lot.
I want to tell you the story.
Okay. I'm ready.
I was born in the country.
Around my home, there were lots of farmers...
People working, who were very, very, very poor.
translation.ko: 집 주변에는 농장 일꾼이 많았죠 찢어지게 가난한 사람들이었어요

translation.en: When I was a child, I was very shy, insecure.
translation.ko: 어릴 때는 수줍음이 많은 아이였죠 소심했고

translation.en: My mother was very overprotective with me.
And I was a dreamer. I was always dreaming.
One day, a bird fell in the yard.
translation.ko: 하루는 새 한 마리가 마당에 떨어졌는데

translation.en: And it was dying.
And I took the bird and I began to...
to... to pray and to... [blows] giving life to that bird.
A neighbor was watching.
And I said, "You're going to live, little bird. You're going to live."
And suddenly, the bird starts to flap its wings
and it starts to get better and it began to fly.
And the lady said, "Oh, this boy has the grace of God
translation.ko: 그러자 아줌마가 나는 사람들을 치료해 줄

translation.en: to help, um... to heal people."
And began to talk about me.
People in the village would knock on the door of my house
translation.ko: 마을 사람들은 우리 집을 찾아와 엄마에게 청했어요

translation.en: and ask my mother, "Oh, please, please let me see Walter."
So my mother put me in a little chair and they began touching me.
translation.ko: 그래서 엄마가 날 의자에 앉혔고 사람들은 나를 만졌죠

translation.en: Touch, touch, touch, touch, touch.
And then I turned into "Walter of Miracles."
Since the moment I was born,
I know that I was not like everybody.
When I saw other boys, I know that I have another way of life.
My brother was all the time riding horses,
planting the sugarcane, leaving with my father.
And I stay with my mother, playing the piano and reading books.
translation.ko: 근데 난 어머니와 집에서 피아노를 치며 책을 읽었어요

translation.en: Everything about me was different.
My mother said, "If you're different, go on being different.
translation.ko: 어머니는 다르면 다른 대로 살라고 하셨어요

translation.en: Don't worry about that.
To be different is a gift.
To be ordinary is common."
I decided, at that time,
I'm going to fabricate, create a famous person in me.
translation.ko: 타고난 천성을 살려서 유명 인사가 돼야겠다고요

translation.en: And so I know that that push is going to explode in something important.
translation.ko: 그리고 그런 마음가짐이 엄청난 결과를 불러올 줄 알았죠

translation.en: My little doll.
Willie?
[in English] Yes, Walter.
-My vitamins? -Yeah.
These are the different multivitamins that Walter takes.
translation.ko: 이건 왈테르가 복용하는 다양한 종합 비타민이에요

translation.en: Salmon oil for the cholesterol.
Eyebright for the eyes.
Collagen peptides.
Cod liver oil.
Pycnogenols.
Hemp proteins.
My name is Willie Acosta,
and I'm Walter Mercado's assistant for many years.
Many years.
[interviewer 1] So you're like his right hand?
And the left one, too.
[in Spanish] Look what I got for Runo.
[in English] Pet wipes.
-My dog never stinks. -Stinks. He's stinky.
translation.ko: - 루노는 냄새 안 나 - 냄새가 지독하거든요

translation.en: Never... No, he never stinks.
translation.ko: 루노는 냄새 같은 거 안 나

translation.en: I came to Walter's life very young.
I'm still a young adult. [laughs]
But I was very young when I came to Walter's life.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 젊을 때부터 왈테르의 일을 봤어요

translation.en: [Walter] Willie belongs now to my family.
I have many nieces.
Ivonne,
Betty,
Bibi and Dannette...
and Carmensita and Charito.
[in Spanish] What's her sign?
[Carmen in English] Her sign is Sagittarius.
And she is Pisces.
[Walter] I love my family.
But Willie is with me always.
He assists me with my clothes, with my costumes.
translation.ko: 내 옷과 무대 의상도 관리해 주고요

translation.en: [Willie] I do many jobs.
I assist Walter in everything that he needs.
I take Walter shopping. I have gone to the movies with Walter.
translation.ko: 왈테르와 쇼핑을 하고 영화도 보러 가요

translation.en: We fly together to places.
We stay in the same hotel in the same room.
[Walter] He knows everything. All my secrets.
Very small secrets, of course...
-Thank you. -You have to eat cookies, too.
-They're good for the system. -You want to see me fat?
translation.ko: - 몸에 좋아요 - 내가 뚱보 되면 좋겠어?

translation.en: Not fat, but, you know, healthy.
-I'm so healthy. -I know you are.
I protect Walter from anything, from everything.
So don't get too bitchy with him. Yes. [chuckles]
-No. No cookies for Runo. -No.
translation.ko: 루노한테 쿠키 주지 마세요 안 줘

translation.en: [Walter] It was a tsunami of art in Puerto Rico.
Everybody was thinking about art.
In the University of Puerto Rico, I began dancing classes.
translation.ko: 난 푸에르토리코 대학에서 춤을 배우기 시작했어요

translation.en: I just have a passion for dancing.
Puerto Rico was a little island,
and I was living 100 years in advance.
But I was dancing, and also at the same time,
translation.ko: 난 춤을 췄고 연기도 하면서 여러 연극에 출연했어요

translation.en: I was acting and having a lot of plays.
After that, I became an actor in television.
I did a lot of telenovelas.
[Willie] Walter was doing a play in Puerto Rico called
called El tríptico de amor, dolor y muerte.
Elin Ortiz had a show in Telemundo
translation.ko: 텔레문도 방송국의 쇼 진행자였던 엘린 오르티스가

translation.en: and he invited Walter to do the promo for the play.
Walter was dressed like a Hindu prince
with a beautiful white cape, a lot of makeup,
translation.ko: 멋진 흰색 망토를 걸치고 두꺼운 화장을 하고요

translation.en: and Elin Ortiz told him, "No, we'll do the promo later on,
translation.ko: 근데 엘린 오르티스가 연극 홍보는 나중에 하고

translation.en: but, Walter, let's talk about astrology.
You're always reading the palm of everybody around here,
translation.ko: '당신은 항상 주변 사람들의 손금을 봐 주고'

translation.en: and you're always asking, 'What's your sign?' and, 'What's your sign?' and, 'What's your sign?'
Let's talk about astrology."
I began to talk, but in a very improvised way,
translation.ko: 난 말을 시작했어요 그냥 그 자리에서 생각나는 대로요

translation.en: from my heart.
For 15 minutes, I was in a monologue.
"Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, the Moon.
Leo, you are the Sun. Virgo, Mercury.
Libra, Venus."
So... [gibbering]
Nobody expect that.
[Willie] When the segment finished,
translation.ko: 그 코너가 끝나자 텔레문도 방송국 국장이

translation.en: the general manager of Telemundo came downstairs running,
translation.ko: 그 코너가 끝나자 텔레문도 방송국 국장이 쏜살같이 내려와 말했죠

translation.en: and said, "He has to do that show again tomorrow because people are calling."
translation.ko: '시청자 전화가 쇄도하니까 내일 또 방송에 나와 줘요'

translation.en: "The telephone lines are full,
so I need to see you tomorrow, here,
doing the same show today.
I want Walter Mercado every day, 15 minutes a day in this show.
And I want you with the same costume tomorrow.
I want Walter in capes."
After three months, he started the one-hour show
of Walter, las estrellas y usted.
[in Spanish] And now the sign of Capricorn!
We have two paths, two human beings
and one important decision to make: make it.
You are beginning a cycle of good things: health, money, joy and love.
translation.ko: '이제부터 건강과 재물, 기쁨 사랑을 다 얻게 될 거예요'

translation.en: Have peace in your soul and love for everyone,
even for the unsufferable, for the critics and for religious fanatics.
translation.ko: '꼴 보기 싫은 사람과 트집꾼 종교에 미친 사람들까지요'

translation.en: Your whole life changes and you'll be happy.
Time will heal old wounds.
A change is coming, a move, a trip, something very favorable to you.
translation.ko: '변화가 찾아오고 있고 이사나 여행이 좋은 결과를 낳죠'

translation.en: And it will be very fortunate. [continues indistinctly]
[in English] That show started August the 3rd, 1969.
And it became one of the top shows in Puerto Rico ever.
translation.ko: 푸에르토리코 역사에서 손꼽히는 인기 쇼가 됐어요

translation.en: Let's go. Three, two...
translation.ko: 좋아요, 셋, 둘... "빌 바쿨라 전 매니저"

translation.en: I'm Bill Bakula.
I never wanted to be on the stage or in front of the camera.
translation.ko: 무대 위나 카메라 앞에 서고 싶은 적은 없어요

translation.en: I always wanted to be behind.
That was my... my passion.
I've known Walter
since I was a young man watching him on television.
translation.ko: 언제였더라... 전 젊을 때 TV에서 왈테르를 봤어요

translation.en: So I was flipping through channels one night...
[Bill] You're flipping fast and you stop...
...because you saw this guy dressed like...
in all opulence.
[Bill] Rings and jewelry.
He made you stop. He had the "stop" quality.
[Bill] All of a sudden, you're engaged.
And when he got to your sign,
you identified with it immediately. You said, "He's talking about me."
[Bill] So I made an appointment to get a consultation.
And it was incredible.
So I said, "Well...
is the consultation over?" He goes, "Yeah."
"Okay, now I wanna talk to you about something."
Under my arm, I had a bunch of storyboards.
And those storyboards basically depicted a new television show for him.
translation.ko: 왈테르를 위한 새 TV 프로그램의 아이디어가 담겨 있었죠

translation.en: Something fresh with a higher production quality.
Two weeks later, we were taping his first show.
[Bill] We did 10 one-hour episodes, 48 minutes,
in a weekend.
And Walter was on point.
It was the first program on television that was wholly dedicated to astrology.
translation.ko: 우린 오로지 점성술만 다룬 최초의 TV 프로그램이었어요

translation.en: It was terrific.
It's kind of like a motivational speaker, you know,
that uses astrology to motivate people.
And people need motivation.
[in Spanish] Aquarius: You are a positive Aquarian.
Something important is that you're a go-getter.
You've broken barriers.
You've always loved creating, inventing, hustling.
translation.ko: 늘 새로운 걸 만들고 열심히 하는 걸 좋아하고요

translation.en: You never freeze up.
[in English] In that moment, the people were hungry to listen to some word of inspiration.
translation.ko: 당시 사람들은 힘을 주는 격려의 말에 굶주려 있었어요

translation.en: Maybe it was the right moment and the right occasion with the right people.
translation.ko: 적시 적소에 날 필요로 했던 사람들과 있었다고 생각해요

translation.en: Everything was right.
According to the stars, it was perfect.
[Bill] Every talent needs somebody behind them.
I was the coach for one single purpose:
Walter's message to get out to as many people as possible.
translation.ko: 왈테르의 메시지를 최대한 많은 사람에게 전하는 거요

translation.en: [Walter] When I entered the world of astrology, it was a boom.
translation.ko: 내가 이 세계에 발을 들였을 때 점성술 붐이 일었어요

translation.en: It was a boom! Really a boom.
Walter was doing television, he was doing radio.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 TV에 출연했어요 라디오 방송도 했죠

translation.en: [Tony Hernandez] He would record daily horoscopes.
And would break them out across morning drive time.
[Tony] It's easier to tell you about
translation.ko: 왈테르가 진출했던 시장보다 진출하지 않은 시장을

translation.en: the markets Walter wasn't in than the markets Walter was in.
translation.ko: 왈테르가 진출했던 시장보다 진출하지 않은 시장을 찾는 게 훨씬 빨라요

translation.en: Probably about 150 radio stations carried his programming at his peak.
translation.ko: 전성기 때는 150여 방송국이 왈테르의 프로를 내보냈죠

translation.en: We started getting interest from places
that you never even imagined that there would be a Hispanic community.
[Bill] Next thing you know, Walter starts airing all throughout Latin America.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 라틴 아메리카 전역으로 진출하기 시작했죠

translation.en: The next mission was Brazil. Second largest market after the US.
translation.ko: 다음 목표는 미국 다음으로 큰 시장인 브라질이었어요

translation.en: Then we jumped to Italy, Holland, the UK.
[Walter] Bill made me the most well-known psychic of this world,
translation.ko: 빌 덕분에 세상에서 가장 유명한 점성술사가 됐어요

translation.en: the prophet of the new age.
Then I put everything I had, and everything I didn't have,
translation.ko: 그다음 전 있는 거 없는 거 탈탈 털어서

translation.en: into crossing over into the general market in the US.
-[man] Wow. -[Howard Stern] Hey, Walter.
-How you doing? There he is. -[Robin Quivers] That's the outfit!
-[Howard] That's the outfit I see on TV. -[Robin] With the beads and everything.
translation.ko: - TV에서 봤어요 - 화려한 장식이 달려 있죠

translation.en: [Bill] We got an invitation from Howard Stern.
[Howard] You're bigger than Jesus Christ.
-No. -[Howard] Oh, tell the truth.
-They treat me like Jesus. Like Buddha. -[Howard] Yes, see? Right.
[Bill] At first, I was hesitant about it.
But I knew that Howard was very much into yoga and Hinduism.
translation.ko: 근데 하워드는 요가와 힌두교에 관심이 많았죠

translation.en: You know who was born on my birthday? -Maharishi Mahesh Yogi. -That's true.
translation.ko: 마하리시 마헤시 요기도 나랑 생일이 같아요

translation.en: -[Howard] That is correct. -At the same hour like you.
translation.ko: - 그렇죠 - 진짜예요 - 태어난 시간대도 같아요 - 맞아요

translation.en: -[Howard] Yes. -[Robin] The same hour?
You are working from the navel down, and he was working from the navel up.
translation.ko: 당신은 배꼽 아래의 전문가고 그분은 배꼽 위의 전문가죠

translation.en: [Bill] Then he did Regis & Kathie Lee.
For him, I see a recuperation. A stress, he's having--
A recuperation?
-For your heart. -Yes, for your heart.
translation.ko: - 회복요? - 마음 얘기군요 맞아요, 마음의 회복이죠

translation.en: [Bill] Sally Jessy Raphael.
[Sally] A hundred-and-twenty million people
turn to this man for advice every day.
And all of a sudden, the general market started to get who this Walter was.
translation.ko: 갑자기 북미 시장에서도 왈테르를 주목하기 시작한 거죠

translation.en: I predict that you're going to be the greatest comedian of the next millennium.
translation.ko: 다가오는 새천년에는 당신이 최고의 코미디언이 될 거예요

translation.en: -He is! -[audience cheering]
[Bill] He landed a book deal with Time Warner. It was called Beyond the Horizon.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 타임 워너와 책 '비욘드 더 호라이즌'도 계약했죠

translation.en: Before we knew it, we had really penetrated all of the Americas,
translation.ko: 우리도 모르는 새에 아메리카 전역에 알려졌어요

translation.en: from Canada all the way to Tierra del Fuego.
There used to be this newscast called Primer Impacto on Univision.
And every day at 5:47 in the afternoon,
they would have the daily astrological forecast with Walter Mercado.
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도가 오늘의 운세를 알려 줬어요

translation.en: They didn't have the weather forecast, they had an astrological forecast.
translation.ko: 일기 예보도 없었는데 점성술 운세 예보가 있었죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Walter is here to reveal the message of the stars.
I want you to know that the signs are divided into mutable, cardinal and fixed.
Pisces, you're mutable. You go with the flow.
[Maria Lopez Alvarez in English] We did it as a segment.
People love to hear their astrology. Now you'll get it on TV,
translation.ko: 사람들이 점성술에 열광했는데 다른 사람도 아니고

translation.en: and we're gonna give it to you with none other than Walter Mercado.
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도가 TV에 나와서 운세를 알려 줬잖아요

translation.en: And immediately it was a hit.
[Raul] For Primer Impacto at that time, he was a big asset.
I would say he was one of the biggest characters.
Not just with Spanish TV, anywhere.
December, the stars, and you.
Aries, your higher mind pushing you to new attainments,
translation.ko: 12월, 양자리의 운세입니다 더 고차원적인 정신이 당신을 새로운 경지로 이끌어 주죠

translation.en: to new heights.
translation.ko: 더 고차원적인 정신이 당신을 새로운 경지로 이끌어 주죠

translation.en: Travel is okay.
I never dared to be traveling through the world,
or having 300 disciples in Brazil,
or 500 disciples in Colombia.
Bill opened many doors to me.
I met presidents, ambassadors, famous people.
Prime ministers, presidents from different countries,
came to Walter for private readings.
We saw his popularity just grow and grow and grow and grow.
[Bill] He couldn't walk on the street or there'd be a mob.
translation.ko: 군중이 몰려들어 길을 걸어 다니기도 힘들었어요

translation.en: [reporter] Everywhere he goes,
Walter Mercado is surrounded by legions of adoring, devoted fans.
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도가 어디를 가든 열혈 팬들이 구름같이 둘러쌉니다

translation.en: I've been waiting since nine o'clock in the morning.
I was in the eye of the eagle.
Hundreds of millions of people were watching his programs every day.
translation.ko: 매일 수억 명이 왈테르의 프로그램을 시청했어요

translation.en: He almost became like a religion.
[Maria] We were doing a segment on Primer Impacto.
We put him in the headlines and said, "And Walter is with us live."
translation.ko: 왈테르가 현장에 와 있다는 헤드라인을 내보냈는데

translation.en: We had people swarming out of the building in 15 minutes.
People started wanting to touch him
like if he was holier than the Pope.
[Walter] Miami, New York, Panama, Colombia,
everywhere, everybody wants a piece of Walter.
translation.ko: 곳곳에서 모든 사람이 이 몸을 영접하고 싶어 했죠

translation.en: Sometimes people say, "Walter you are very egocentric or narcissistic."
translation.ko: 내가 자기중심적이거나 자아도취라고 하는 사람도 있죠

translation.en: No matter how much money it costs, I always say, "You have to be radiant.
translation.ko: 아무리 돈이 많이 들어도 난 항상 빛나야 하고

translation.en: You have to be Walter."
Okay.
He has an augmented face that defies gender and maybe even age.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 성별을 뛰어넘는 복합적인 얼굴을 가졌어요 나이도 가늠할 수 없죠

translation.en: And his hair is a hybrid between
really good male hair from the '70s
and really good, glamourous grandma hair.
[interviewer 2] Have you had any plastic surgery done?
Little arrangement.
A special Botox like Nicole Kidman.
translation.ko: 배우 니콜 키드먼처럼 특별한 보톡스를 맞았어요

translation.en: I'm just like Dorian Gray.
My picture is growing old, but I'm growing young.
translation.ko: 사진 속에서는 늙어 가지만 나는 젊어지죠

translation.en: For every show, I have a special cape,
or robe.
Some are very heavy.
Some are lighter.
Some are hand-painted.
Each one has a story.
[Willie] He was the first person to use capes with beads,
translation.ko: 왈테르가 처음으로 구슬 장식이 달린 망토와 화장, 염색 머리

translation.en: and makeup, dyed hairs.
translation.ko: 구슬 장식이 달린 망토와 화장, 염색 머리

translation.en: A lot of jewelry.
[Walter] This is from one of the best designers in Brazil.
Very humble.
[interviewer 1] Wait. The bracelet is very humble?
[Walter] Yes. You like it?
Many designers started doing capes for him.
translation.ko: 많은 디자이너가 왈테르를 위한 망토를 만들게 됐죠

translation.en: Versace did something for him.
Isaac Mizrahi,
Swarovski crystals,
sequins, rhinestone, pearls...
They cost a lot of money, but they were beautiful.
The message that Walter is bringing to you, he decorated.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 메시지를 잘 포장해 시청자들에게 전달했죠

translation.en: [Walter] I am the picture, and the cape is the frame.
The cape covers me
translation.ko: 망토가... 나란 사람을 가리고 내 이미지를...

translation.en: and makes my image to go...
to the heart of my audience, of my people.
translation.ko: 시청자와 팬들의 마음에 강렬하게 심어 주죠

translation.en: [Bill] He had his look, so did Elvis, so did Liberace,
translation.ko: 왈테르만의 개성이 있었어요 엘비스와 리버라치도 그랬죠

translation.en: so does the Pope.
If it doesn't look good, we're not even gonna listen.
translation.ko: 볼품없는 사람 말은 아무도 안 들어요

translation.en: [in Spanish] Thank you very much and don't miss Walter Mercado's outfit.
translation.ko: 감사합니다, 왈테르 메르카도의 의상도 주목해 주세요

translation.en: It's something like a pumpkin, a pumpkin about to smother him.
It's marvelous.
Night of magic and mystery,
night where anything is possible,
translation.ko: 무슨 일이든 일어날 수 있는 밤이죠

translation.en: where those we loved and loved us, return to the earth
translation.ko: 우리가 사랑했고 우리를 사랑했던 이들이 이승에 돌아와

translation.en: to seek out the warmth of heart and home, of love.
translation.ko: 따뜻한 가족의 품과 따스한 사랑을 찾아요

translation.en: [Nydia Caro in English] Do you know anybody else that looks like Walter,
translation.ko: 왈테르처럼 생긴 사람 봤어요? 왈테르처럼 말하거나 옷 입는 사람은요?

translation.en: or speaks like Walter, or dresses like Walter?
He's very much his own incredible creation.
He just broke the mold entirely.
[Karlo Karlo] People are mesmerized by the beauty of Walter,
by the glamor of Walter.
[Walter] I want to look beautiful. I want to look alluring.
I want to mesmerize people.
I study dancing, so I use my hands.
translation.ko: 난 춤을 배워서 손동작을 잘 써요

translation.en: The people love all that kind of stupid things.
So, I used the stupid things to teach, to help, to serve,
translation.ko: 그래서 그런 것들을 이용해 가르치고, 도와주고 기여하고, 제공해요

translation.en: to give a beautiful message of love and peace.
translation.ko: 기여하고, 제공해요 사랑과 평화의 아름다운 메시지를 전하죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Love is the reason for everything.
Love is the beginning and the end.
Love is the reason to live.
He broke many boundaries.
His whole look: his capes, the layers, the fabulous costumes.
translation.ko: 머리부터 발끝까지 망토와 겹겹의 화려한 의상으로 치장하죠

translation.en: Now it doesn't seem that strange.
But when he did it, it was scandalous.
translation.ko: 그 당시에는 빈축을 살 만한 것이었어요

translation.en: And he did it anyway.
How are you doing, little animals of creation?
On this occasion, -I'm anxiously awaiting today's guest. -[audience chuckling]
translation.ko: 난 오늘 손님이 나오기만을 애타게 기다리고 있어요

translation.en: But he's had many problems because of the love of a woman.
translation.ko: 한 여인을 사랑해 여러 가지 문제에 봉착한 남자죠

translation.en: In the '90s, they gave me my own show.
It was like a sketch show where I played different characters
translation.ko: 다양한 캐릭터를 연기하는 일종의 코미디 쇼였고

translation.en: and I immediately thought, "I have to do a Walter Mercado impression."
translation.ko: 전 바로 왈테르 메르카도를 흉내 내기로 마음먹었어요

translation.en: My impression has the same rings, capes, hair.
translation.ko: 그래서 의상과 액세서리 머리 모양까지 따라 했죠

translation.en: It's one of the most famous characters I have.
translation.ko: 내가 연기했던 가장 유명한 캐릭터 중 하나예요

translation.en: I think a big reason they love it is because it's based on Walter Mercado.
translation.ko: 왈테르 메르카도 역할이라 인기가 많았던 것 같아요

translation.en: [Mireya in English] Walter was very beloved and very much an integrated part of the culture.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 큰 사랑을 받았고 문화의 복합체라고 할 수 있었어요

translation.en: [Mireya] But he would also get folded into gay jokes.
translation.ko: 하지만 동성애 농담의 소재가 되기도 했어요

translation.en: He was embraced and othered at the same time.
[in Spanish] Many of his imitations were meant to ridicule him.
He never liked being imitated.
You appear to be dressed a little bit like me.
Then don't do a bad imitation of me, because everybody does.
translation.ko: 다들 형편없이 따라 하는데 이왕이면 제대로 해요

translation.en: I would never wear those pants.
[Willie in English] When they see Walter and they make fun of him,
translation.ko: 사람들은 왈테르를 보고 놀려 먹으려 들었어요

translation.en: it's because they wish they could be like Walter. Yes.
-[in Spanish] What's your love sign? -[Walter] Scorpio, shut up...
He stings from behind!
And I sting from the front!
I'm like you, vice versa and versatile!
[Karlo Karlo in English] The Latino community was homophobic.
I mean, especially '70s, '80s... I mean, still nowadays,
but back then, it was, like, much stronger.
And perception of masculinity was so square.
Growing up as a queer boy and watching Walter Mercado...
translation.ko: 퀴어 소년이었던 저는 왈테르 메르카도를 보며

translation.en: gave me hope.
I saw Walter and I was like, "Okay, I'm not that different."
translation.ko: 왈테르를 보니까 나도 별종이 아니란 생각이 들었죠

translation.en: Here you have a man on television breaking all of these rules.
translation.ko: 모든 관습을 깨는 사람이 TV에 나왔으니까요

translation.en: [woman in Portuguese] You have a very feminine look...
[in Spanish] As a kid, over the phone people would call me Miss.
translation.ko: 어릴 때 전화를 받으면 여자로 오해받곤 했어요

translation.en: It never bothers me.
"Who is this? Hello, Mrs.--" "No, it's a Mr."
translation.ko: 목소리만 듣고 '아가씨'라고 해서 남자라고 정정해 줬었죠

translation.en: It doesn't bother me.
[in English] He has a very feminine energy.
He's an androgyne. He looks like a woman.
Sometimes, he looks like a man.
The people that, you know, they said,
"Oh, that's a queer" or, "That's a faggot"... I don't care.
translation.ko: 퀴어니 호모니 하면서 입방아를 찧었지만 정작 당사자는 무시했어요

translation.en: He doesn't care.
Walter always takes a pill called an I-don't-care pill,
translation.ko: 왈테르는 항상 '무시' 약을 입에 달고 살아요

translation.en: and I started drinking that pill, too.
And I use Vaseline so everything's slippery on my body. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 전 바셀린을 발라요 몸에서 다 미끄러지라고요

translation.en: Whatever they say...
I use Vaseline.
[Mireya] Somehow, inside a misogynistic, super-Catholic culture,
translation.ko: 신기하게 여성 혐오가 존재하는 독실한 가톨릭 문화권에서

translation.en: Walter could thrive.
We needed Walter in that landscape.
[in Spanish] Are you heterosexual or no?
Let me tell you something, I respect sex as something sacred.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어요 난 섹스가 신성하다고 생각해요

translation.en: For me, sex is spiritual.
I'm married to my public, to my people.
Walter is very protective about opening up,
including with his family.
I've seen journalists try to talk about
translation.ko: 기자들이 삼촌의 성적 지향이나 파트너, 연애 생활에 대해서

translation.en: his sexuality, his partners, his love affairs,
translation.ko: 기자들이 삼촌의 성적 지향이나 파트너, 연애 생활에 대해서 캐묻기도 했는데

translation.en: and they're topics that he just won't touch.
[interviewer 2 in English] You don't talk about sexuality or your identity.
Why is that?
Because I have sexuality with the wind... with the wind,
with the flowers in the garden,
with all the beautiful display of nature.
I don't need a person.
Especially to make me happy, to make me...
translation.ko: 난 사람에게서 행복을 느끼진 않아요 사람을 통해 절정을 맛볼 필요도 없죠

translation.en: to have an orgasmic experience, no.
translation.ko: 사람을 통해 절정을 맛볼 필요도 없죠 난 인생과 섹스를 나눠요

translation.en: I have sex with life.
I have sex with everything.
With clothes, with beauty.
[Willie] People think that I'm his lover.
translation.ko: 남들은 제가 왈테르 애인인 줄 알죠

translation.en: I don't know what they think. They think I have a relation with him.
translation.ko: 이해가 안 되지만요 제가 왈테르와 관계가 있다고 생각해요

translation.en: And my relation with Walter is a very family relation.
translation.ko: 나와 왈테르는 정말 가족 같은 관계예요

translation.en: I have never touched Walter with a finger.
translation.ko: 난 왈테르한테 손도 댄 적 없어요

translation.en: Never in my life.
[Tony] I don't think Walter ever allowed himself to be defined through his sexuality.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 성적 지향이라는 틀로 자신을 규정하길 거부했어요

translation.en: It was none of your business.
He always sort of, you know, straddled that line very carefully.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 항상 신중하게 경계에 걸쳐 있었죠

translation.en: [Karlo Karlo] If Walter Mercado would've come out in the '60s, '70s, '80s,
I think it would've hurt his career.
Puerto Ricans say often...
[in Spanish] "What you can see, you don't ask about."
translation.ko: '봐서 알 수 있는 건 캐묻지 말아라'

translation.en: [in English] And I know, like, visibility is very important.
But not coming out stopped, perhaps, the homophobia from running wild.
translation.ko: 근데 왈테르는 커밍아웃을 안 해서 동성애 혐오를 차단할 수 있었어요

translation.en: [Ivonne in Spanish] There are things that are just so ingrained
translation.ko: 이런 건 어린 시절부터 가족들 사이에서

translation.en: from your childhood, from your family,
that play on repeat in your mind.
It's difficult to change them.
[Karlo Karlo in English] There are so many societal laws that he broke,
it goes beyond coming out.
You use a cape because you're a superhero,
and I see Walter as a superhero.
[Ivonne in Spanish] In terms of his open secrets,
I don't think he confirms or denies anything.
[interviewer 2 in English] You're not telling me Walter Mercado is a virgin?
You're not telling me that you're a virgin?
-The only one in town. -[both laughing]
[interviewer 2] Yeah, the only one in town.
[in Spanish] Here I have a tarot deck,
a special deck on such a special day in such a special month.
translation.ko: 특별한 달의 특별한 날에 어울리는 특별한 카드죠

translation.en: In the month of love, ladies and gentlemen.
For you, Aquarius, I've pulled a card of strength. Because you're strong now.
translation.ko: 물병자리는 힘 카드가 나왔어요 지금은 물병자리가 강하니까요

translation.en: No one knocks you down, no one destroys you, no one holds you back.
translation.ko: 당신을 쓰러뜨리거나 파괴하거나 제지할 사람은 아무도 없죠

translation.en: You're stronger than ever, Aquarius!
[Tony in English] I don't believe in these things.
That's just, sort of, my nature.
But I'll be honest with you, when you meet Walter,
translation.ko: 하지만 솔직히 말해서 왈테르를 만나고 같이 시간을 보내고 나면

translation.en: and you have a chance to spend a little time with Walter,
translation.ko: 왈테르를 만나고 같이 시간을 보내고 나면

translation.en: you realize that there's something there.
Is that something divine? I don't know.
But it's quite unique, and I haven't...
I haven't come across it with anyone else.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 정말 독특하고 그런 사람은... 왈테르뿐이었죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] All of these terrible predictions people make,
all of these cataclysms, tragedies,
disasters coming with the arrival of the new millennium...
translation.ko: 대재앙과 비극 재난이 닥칠 거라고 하는데...

translation.en: Nobody believe any of it.
Those who follow God, don't fear a thing.
translation.ko: 신을 따르는 자들은 두려워할 필요 없죠

translation.en: [Willie in English] He planted in the mind of everybody
translation.ko: 왈테르는 모두의 마음에 믿음, 신앙을 심어 줬어요

translation.en: faith, belief, believe you're gonna be great.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 모두의 마음에 믿음, 신앙을 심어 줬어요 자신이 성공할 거라고 믿으세요

translation.en: You have to put faith.
If you don't have faith, you're never gonna get nothing.
[in Spanish] Virgo, what was once so ugly and sad, it all changes.
translation.ko: 추하고 우울했던 처녀자리에게도 이제 변화가 찾아옵니다

translation.en: The waters will recede.
There will be a total change in your life.
So take advantage to realize
that which yesterday you didn't dare to do, Virgo!
translation.ko: 어제까지 꿈도 꾸지 못했던 일에 도전해 보세요!

translation.en: [Bill in English] If you notice in all his content,
he never says anything negative.
Blessings.
[Bill] Never.
I think that's probably the key ingredient
to his success and his ability to communicate.
translation.ko: 그게 왈테르의 성공과 의사소통 능력의 핵심 요소라고 생각합니다

translation.en: [in Spanish] Being a messenger of the Aquarian Age,
I bring you messages of light,
of love,
and of peace.
[Mauricio Zeilic in English] He would come out every day and he would tell you beautiful things,
translation.ko: 왈테르는 매일 TV에 나와 듣기 좋은 말만 했어요

translation.en: and everybody wants to know if tomorrow's gonna be a better day.
translation.ko: 모두가 내일은 더 잘 풀릴지 궁금해하잖아요

translation.en: [Nydia] He's like a warrior.
I think his message was and still is...
to live with as much love as you can in your life.
[in Spanish] Let's start by broaching
translation.ko: 먼저 당신에 대해서 가장 논란이 되는 질문부터 짚고 넘어갈게요

translation.en: the most controversial questions about Walter Mercado.
translation.ko: 가장 논란이 되는 질문부터 짚고 넘어갈게요

translation.en: -[Walter] All my life. -Uh-huh.
Why do you mix so many different religions?
translation.ko: 왜 여러 가지 종교를 뒤죽박죽 섞어요?

translation.en: Not just, for example, Santeria, primitive religions,
translation.ko: 예를 들면 산테리아와 원시 종교, 기독교, 가톨릭을 전부 통합하잖아요

translation.en: with Christianity, Catholicism, but all of them?
translation.ko: 원시 종교, 기독교, 가톨릭을 전부 통합하잖아요

translation.en: You mix them all and you solve people's problems, why?
translation.ko: 왜 여러 종교를 뒤섞고 문제 해결사를 자청해요?

translation.en: No one has a monopoly on God.
It's ridiculous to think so.
It can be Chango or Santa Barbara. Who cares what you call it?
translation.ko: 샹고든 산타 바바라든 신 이름이 뭐가 중요해요?

translation.en: [in English] I got the best from the Buddhism...
...the best from Hinduism...
...the best from Christianity...
I mix with all kinds of astrology.
I realized that all religions have a point of convergence.
translation.ko: 그러면서 깨달았는데 모든 종교가 한 지점에서 만나요

translation.en: I call it interfaith religion.
You have to be nice to people,
you have to give the best of yourself every moment of your life,
translation.ko: 매 순간 최고의 모습으로 살고자 최선을 다해야 해요

translation.en: and you have to believe in yourself.
[in Spanish] Taurus, be strong, really strong. Insist, don't give up!
translation.ko: 황소자리, 강해져야 합니다! 포기하지 말고 밀어붙여요!

translation.en: Insist until you accomplish what you want. The cosmos will gift it to you.
translation.ko: 여러분의 목표가 이뤄질 때까지요 온 우주가 도와줄 거예요

translation.en: [Tony in English] I think Walter appeals to the masses
because he's able to connect with something that's missing
translation.ko: 많은 사람에게 결핍된 무언가와 연결해 주는 능력이 있거든요

translation.en: for a lot of us, particularly immigrants.
translation.ko: 연결해 주는 능력이 있거든요 특히 이민자들에게요

translation.en: I think he gives us a sense of hope.
I think he gives people a reason to believe
perhaps that their lot in life may have a chance of improving, uh, in short order.
translation.ko: 조만간 인생이 술술 잘 풀릴 기회가 올 거라고요

translation.en: And if you listen to him and you sort of follow his guidelines,
translation.ko: 왈테르의 말을 듣고 그 조언에 따르다 보면

translation.en: it could be a road map towards a better and more fulfilled life.
translation.ko: 더 나은, 더 성공한 인생을 살 수도 있겠죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] May God bless all of you, today, tomorrow and always.
translation.ko: 오늘과 내일, 그리고 언제나 신의 축복이 함께하기를 바랍니다

translation.en: [in English] My message is to give them the force inside themselves.
translation.ko: 내 메시지는 내면에 자신감을 심어 줘요

translation.en: You can win. You can do that. Believe in yourself.
translation.ko: '난 이길 수 있다, 할 수 있다 나 자신을 믿자'

translation.en: And that way, I'm helping people to be stronger.
[announcer] Have questions? Need answers?
Concerned about a loved one?
Need career or love advice?
Hi, I am Walter Mercado.
Thanks for making the Psychic Friends Network
the most popular psychic phone service in the entire world.
translation.ko: 운세 상담 전화로 자리매김하게 애용해 주셔서 감사합니다

translation.en: [Jody Vialy] In the early '90s, there were these 1-9-0-0 numbers,
and Walter's manager, Bill Bakula, decided to do that for Walter,
translation.ko: 왈테르의 매니저 빌 바쿨라가 이 서비스를 시작하기로 했죠

translation.en: so that people could call in and connect to him.
You take calls on the Circle of Power line no matter where you are?
translation.ko: 어디에 있든지 '서클 오브 파워' 전화를 받아요?

translation.en: Yes. I love to be in touch with my people.
[Bill] We created a traditional 1-9-0-0 psychic hotline
translation.ko: 우린 유료 운세 상담 직통 전화를 개설해

translation.en: to great success.
[Bill] We were the only ones in the Hispanic market in the US,
and we were the pioneers to go out of the US.
[in Spanish] I won $9,000 at Indian bingo.
Thank you, Walter. Thank you.
[in English] Actually, in Brazil, he's not really known as Walter Mercado,
translation.ko: 사실 브라질에서는 왈테르 메르카도라는 이름 대신

translation.en: he's known as Ligue Já, and that means "call now."
[Bill] Before we knew it,
translation.ko: 눈 깜짝할 사이에 가입자가 50만 명에 달했어요

translation.en: he had half a million subscribers and 4,000 psychics.
translation.ko: 눈 깜짝할 사이에 가입자가 50만 명에 달했어요 그리고 점성술사 4천 명이 상담 전화를 받았죠

translation.en: Four thousand people answering phones.
translation.ko: 그리고 점성술사 4천 명이 상담 전화를 받았죠

translation.en: My psychics, for me, I don't believe, I know,
are the best in the whole world.
All of them are natural psychics born with the gift.
translation.ko: 모두 천부적인 점성술사거든요 그 능력을 타고났죠

translation.en: The gift to help, to empower other people's life.
translation.ko: 타인의 인생에 힘을 실어 줄 수 있는 능력요

translation.en: I knew that that was... baloney.
It could be my housekeeper answering the calls, you know,
and making 25 bucks a call.
[psychic over phone] I see the two of you will be married within two months of your baby's birth.
translation.ko: 두 사람은 아이가 태어난 후 두 달 안에 결혼할 거예요

translation.en: Married?
I never say, "You're going to win a lottery." Never.
translation.ko: 난 절대 복권에 당첨될 거라고 장담하지 않아요

translation.en: Or, "You're going to have a husband in a week."
translation.ko: 아니면 일주일 안에 남편이 생긴다는 식으로...

translation.en: I never try to fool people. No, I never.
Only the International Psychic Society has predicted
translation.ko: 오로지 국제 심령 협회만 로또 당첨 번호와

translation.en: winning lotto numbers, family reunions and success story.
translation.ko: 오로지 국제 심령 협회만 로또 당첨 번호와 가족 상봉, 성공을 예측했죠

translation.en: [interviewer 2] A lot of these hotlines were scams.
-Well... -[interviewer] Critics would say you were doing it to make money off of poor, desperate people.
translation.ko: 비판자들은 가난하고 절박한 사람들 돈을 뜯었다고 할 겁니다

translation.en: But always they receive some kind of... uh...
words of inspiration or motivation.
[Maria] A lot of people were taking advantage of those 8-0-0 numbers,
translation.ko: 많은 사람이 그런 유료 전화 서비스를 이용해

translation.en: and making millions.
Call me now for a free tarot reading.
And I can guarantee you Walter did not make millions on that.
translation.ko: 하지만 그거로 떼돈을 번 사람은 왈테르가 아니에요

translation.en: Bill Bakula made millions on that.
Bill says, "Don't worry, these are up-and-up people.
Trust me, you'll be fine."
I'm not saying Walter was not in it for the money as well,
translation.ko: 왈테르가 돈을 생각하지 않았다는 말이 아니라 더 순진하고 어수룩한 편이었다는 얘기죠

translation.en: but Walter was more innocent and naive about it.
[Jody] Walter was not about business.
So, it was important to Walter to know
that somebody was taking care of business for him,
translation.ko: 사업을 관리해 줄 사람이 꼭 필요했죠

translation.en: so that he could concentrate on what he did best.
translation.ko: 자기가 잘하는 일에 집중할 수 있도록요

translation.en: Walter expected only good things
and ran into a world of trouble that he never saw coming.
translation.ko: 그러다 큰 곤경에 빠졌어요 생각지도 못했던 문제였죠

translation.en: [Walter] Bill Bakula was my angel.
In one moment in my life, he was sent by God
translation.ko: 신께서 어느 순간 내 인생에 보내 주셨죠

translation.en: to make me and my message of love understand and be known.
translation.ko: 내 사랑과 이해의 메시지를 전파할 수 있도록요

translation.en: He was very smart. He was the master.
Walter had tremendous affection for Bill, and trust and love.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 빌을 굉장히 아꼈어요 신뢰하고 사랑했죠

translation.en: Bill became almost like a son, I would think, to him.
[Betty in Spanish] Bakula gave Walter very expensive gifts.
translation.ko: 바쿨라는 삼촌에게 값비싼 선물을 하곤 했어요

translation.en: He would arrive at a hotel and he'd have a room totally lined with white roses.
translation.ko: 삼촌이 묵는 호텔 방을 흰 장미로 채우는 식이었죠

translation.en: [in English] Twenty bunches of roses.
Twenty, every day.
[Ivonne in Spanish] It was very extravagant.
[Walter in English] He would say, "Walter, you can't eat rice and beans.
translation.ko: 빌은 나한테 밥과 콩 같은 건 먹지 말라고 했어요

translation.en: No, you have to eat caviar and you have always the most exquisite food."
translation.ko: 늘 캐비아 같은 고급 음식을 먹어야 한다고 강조했죠

translation.en: I had my own airplane. Everything was excellent.
translation.ko: 난 전용기도 있었고 모든 게 근사했어요

translation.en: I loved those things.
[in Spanish] Walter likes to please everyone. [Betty] Mmm-hmm.
translation.ko: 삼촌은 모두를 즐겁게 해 주는 성격이에요

translation.en: So if you're kind to him,
he will try to please you.
[in English] I don't ever remember hearing Walter say no.
He's not that type of personality.
Inside, he's a little boy that just wants to be loved and respected.
translation.ko: 속은 아직 어린애로 사랑과 존경을 바랄 뿐이죠

translation.en: Walter would do what Bill would ask him to do.
translation.ko: 왈테르는 빌이 뭘 부탁하든 다 했을 거예요

translation.en: He was almost like, "Okay, if I have to do it, I have to do it. Okay!"
translation.ko: '내가 해야 하는 일이라면 해야지' 이런 식이었어요

translation.en: Okay.
-[in Spanishi] Here? -[in English] Okay.
Okay. Okay.
[in Spanish] "On my way!"
[in English] Okay, no problem.
[in Spanish] He had this power to bewitch him, to wrap him up in promises.
translation.ko: 빌은 삼촌을 홀리는 힘이 있었고 감언이설로 숱한 약속을 했죠

translation.en: And Walter is so fanciful, he had him hook, line and sinker.
translation.ko: 삼촌은 너무 공상에 빠져 살아 빌에게 완전히 속았고요

translation.en: [Walter in English] One night I asked the lawyer to come to my house
translation.ko: 하루는 변호사에게 집에 와 달라고 했어요

translation.en: and I said, "I have a contract for something quite important.
Read it very well."
And he said, "Okay, I will do it."
The next day, he say, "Sign it, it's perfect."
translation.ko: 그다음 날 변호사는 완벽하다며 서명하라고 했어요

translation.en: And I don't even read the contract.
[Maria] Walter just signed what he was asked to sign.
He didn't have someone really looking out for him.
translation.ko: 진짜 왈테르를 생각해 주는 사람이 없었죠

translation.en: The lawyer who reviewed it didn't really properly advise Walter
translation.ko: 당시 담당 변호사는 계약 범위와 내용에 대해

translation.en: on the scope and nature of the contract.
So, Walter blindly signed the agreement.
[in Spanish] That's where the problems began.
[in English] They seemed to have a nice friendship, a good business relationship,
translation.ko: 두 사람은 좋은 친구이자 동업자로 보였어요

translation.en: and so Walter trusted that what Bill Bakula was doing for him
translation.ko: 그래서 왈테르는 빌 바쿨라가 다 자기를 위해서 그랬다고

translation.en: was in his best interests.
[in Spanish] Remember that the artist is never a businessman.
translation.ko: 원래 예술가는 사업가가 될 수 없잖아요

translation.en: An artist is always thinking about his art, how he's going to look,
translation.ko: 예술가는 항상 자기 작품과 대중에게 어떻게 보일지

translation.en: how he's going to impress his audience that day.
[man in English] Five, four, three, two...
At that point, my communication with Walter ceased,
and Bill became my main contact.
For Bill, these things were transactional.
It was about, you know, how can I maximize revenue?
Walter was being advised by some of his family members,
translation.ko: 왈테르는 가족들이 해 주는 얘기를 듣고

translation.en: who made him realize that there were some issues with the relationship.
translation.ko: 빌과 자신의 동업에 문제가 있다는 사실을 깨달았어요

translation.en: When family gets involved in the businesses of an artist...
vey seldomly it works well for the artist.
He tried to sell all my old material.
translation.ko: 빌은 내 예전 자료를 다 팔려고 했어요

translation.en: He was recycling old horoscopes
and running it as if it was current.
It was not right.
I have to be very honest with my people.
But I couldn't stop him
because under the new contract, he had control of all materials.
translation.ko: 새 계약서 때문에 모든 권리가 빌에게 있었거든요

translation.en: [Carlos] The contract gave everything:
his name, his likeness, his image, to Bill Bakula.
translation.ko: 이름과 초상권, 영상권까지 빌 바쿨라에게 넘어갔죠

translation.en: Both parties were represented by competent attorneys.
Both parties understood the contract and he got paid.
translation.ko: 서로 계약 내용을 이해하고 있었죠 왈테르는 돈을 받았고요

translation.en: He got paid according to the contract.
[Carlos] There was no timeframe for the agreement.
In other words, this thing would last forever.
There was very little room to even attempt to terminate the agreement.
It gave really no benefit to Walter.
[Walter] He's the owner of all my decisions, of everything in my life.
translation.ko: 빌이 내 인생의 모든 결정권을 쥐었어요

translation.en: He owns my life.
And then he stopped paying. He stopped paying.
translation.ko: 그러다가 나중엔 돈도 한 푼 안 줬어요

translation.en: Wilma says, "We need the money. We need the money. And they are not sending the checks."
translation.ko: 윌마가 돈이 필요하다고 하는데 빌이 안 보낸다고 했죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Walter continued to record his program and comply with the contract,
translation.ko: 삼촌은 계속 프로그램을 녹화했고 계약서에 명시된 대로 활동했는데 수입은 뚝 끊겼죠

translation.en: but the money wouldn't come.
translation.ko: 계약서에 명시된 대로 활동했는데 수입은 뚝 끊겼죠

translation.en: [Ivonne] So at that point, Walter cancelled the contract.
But Bill said the contract was for eternity.
translation.ko: 하지만 빌은 그게 영구 계약이라고 했죠

translation.en: [Walter in English] When I discovered that my contract
translation.ko: 그 계약을 어떻게 할 수 없다는

translation.en: is so difficult to deal with,
I tried to repair and to talk to him to make a new contract and go on.
translation.ko: 빌과 화해하고 잘 얘기해서 계약서를 새로 쓰려고 했어요

translation.en: [Bill] We paid him to buy his business, not to rent it.
translation.ko: 우린 왈테르의 사업을 사들였지 빌린 게 아니었어요

translation.en: He sold his name. He sold his brand.
But there was a disagreement of how they viewed things
and the black letter on the contract.
So, we went to court.
Everything began to... [imitates crumbling noise]
Our claim for damages against Walter was just $1.
translation.ko: 왈테르에게 청구한 손해 배상 액수는 딱 1달러였어요

translation.en: We didn't wanna hurt him economically,
we just wanted the world to know that we were right.
translation.ko: 만천하에 우리가 옳다고 알리고 싶었을 뿐이죠

translation.en: That's not true.
Actually, Bill Bakula was looking for Walter to pay
translation.ko: 사실 빌 바쿨라는 1,400만~1,500만 달러의 배상금을 받아 내려고 했죠

translation.en: about $14-$15 million in damages.
It was a nightmare of many problems, injunctions and...
translation.ko: 많은 문제와 법원의 중지 명령으로 악몽 같은 시기였어요

translation.en: It was a real nightmare.
At that point, Walter was not allowed to do anything
translation.ko: 당시 왈테르는 아무것도 할 수 없었어요

translation.en: because Bill Bakula owned his image.
And so, unfortunately, we had to pull Walter from the show.
translation.ko: 그래서... 할 수 없이 왈테르를 프로에서 빼야 했어요

translation.en: [Wilma] It was very shocking that, in the court,
translation.ko: 너무 충격이었어요 법원은 왈테르의 이름을 다른 사람에게 주려고 했죠

translation.en: they would give Walter's name to somebody else.
translation.ko: 법원은 왈테르의 이름을 다른 사람에게 주려고 했죠

translation.en: I've never seen anything like that happen in the world,
that you could give your name over to another person as a trademark.
translation.ko: 내 이름이 상표권이 돼서 남에게 넘어갈 수 있다니요

translation.en: When you try to explain to people,
"No, he lost the right to his name and he cannot be on TV,"
translation.ko: '자기 이름 사용권을 잃었고 TV에 못 나온대'

translation.en: people, like me, couldn't understand that.
translation.ko: 나 같은 사람은 이해를 못 했죠

translation.en: [Carlos] There was a pretty severe financial impact on Walter.
He was not receiving any funds.
He was really unable to transact any business during that period of time.
translation.ko: 소송이 진행되는 동안 아무 일도 할 수 없어서

translation.en: It was difficult for him.
We brought in our own lawsuit to do away with the agreement.
translation.ko: 우린 그 계약을 파기하려고 따로 소송을 제기했어요

translation.en: [Maria] I was asked to appear in court.
And they had Walter and Bill Bakula in the courtroom,
one on one side and one on the other side, and they were looking at me intently. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 양쪽에 떨어져 앉아 날 뚫어져라 쳐다봤죠

translation.en: [Walter] It was like a fight between two forces.
This was a war. A war.
[in Spanish] In the first lawsuit, one part Bakula won
translation.ko: 첫 번째 소송에서는 빌 바쿨라와 삼촌 둘 다

translation.en: and another part Walter won,
so then we had to initiate another process.
So we stayed sort of in limbo.
[in English] He would have lawyers in Mexico, lawyers in Argentina,
lawyers in Puerto Rico, lawyers in Miami.
To be in a court fighting with the people that you love
is difficult for me.
And I had to face facts.
That was a difficult time, yes, very difficult.
It was hard, yes.
And Walter is very sensitive. He's a very sensitive person.
I've never regretted anything in my life.
Regret, that's out of the dictionary.
There are no regrets.
Ultimately, the jury determined
that Walter had interfered with those contracts,
translation.ko: 왈테르가 그 계약에 지장을 주긴 했지만

translation.en: but that there was no damage suffered by Bill Bakula.
translation.ko: 빌 바쿨라가 받은 피해는 없다고 결론을 내렸어요

translation.en: So, Walter was returned all of his rights,
his name, his image, his likeness,
which is what Walter ultimately wanted.
It was a long, hard battle, and, um...
the consequences were severe for us, and for Walter, above all.
translation.ko: 우리도 고생하긴 했지만 왈테르가 제일 많이 힘들었죠

translation.en: [in Spanish] Six years he fought.
Six lost years, during which he lost millions of dollars.
[in English] Emotionally, it affected him tremendously.
translation.ko: 감정 소모가 말도 못 하게 컸고...

translation.en: I think... I think, eventually, it affected him physically.
translation.ko: 감정 소모가 말도 못 하게 컸고... 결국 왈테르의 건강까지 악화시켰겠죠

translation.en: I do believe Bill broke Walter's heart.
translation.ko: 빌은 왈테르에게... 씻지 못할 상처를 줬어요

translation.en: In the beginning, Bill was his angel,
and towards the end, Bill was his devil.
When I get to the hospital, Walter was dead.
translation.ko: 병원에 도착해 보니 삼촌은 가망이 없는 상태였죠

translation.en: There was no... no vital signs at all.
[in Spanish] I was clutching the Bible, praying to God.
[Willie in English] He has three arteries that were clogged.
[interviewer 2] Were you worried that this was the end?
Yes. Yes.
He was so tired of fighting.
He was tired of so many things, you know.
[in Spanish] Stress was the principle cause of the heart attack.
translation.ko: 심장 마비의 주요 원인은 다름 아닌 스트레스였어요

translation.en: In Puerto Rico, there wasn't much help for him,
so he was moved from hospital to hospital.
[Betty] You see him fighting for his life.
We're going to do everything in our power.
Let's air lift him.
You don't know what's going to happen, you don't know if he'll make it alive.
translation.ko: 어떻게 될지 몰랐고 삼촌이 산다는 보장도 없었죠

translation.en: [Ivonne] We arrived in Cleveland at five in the morning.
[Walter in English] My consciousness was coming and going.
It's a very strange feeling.
[in Spanish] I opened my eyes and I saw...
[in English] ...beautiful eyes, blue eyes,
blonde hair, a boy, a girl,
